articles.title: Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty win Swiss Open doubles title - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Badminton News: The World Championships bronze medallist doubles pair of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty on Sunday won the Swiss Open title, beating China's
